content.html: Like many other women I've had a hell of a time being patronised, dismissed, ignored and overruled by doctors. It's taken over a decade to get a diagnosis for things like endometriosis. BUT I AT LEAST THOUGHT IT WAS IN THE TRAINING
content.value:
Like many other women I've had a hell of a time being patronised, dismissed, ignored and overruled by doctors. It's taken over a decade to get a diagnosis for things like endometriosis.

BUT I AT LEAST THOUGHT IT WAS IN THE TRAINING
